thread.title: Kim Jong-un invites experts in for nuclear test site shutdown

title: Kim Jong-un invites experts in for nuclear test site shutdown
text:
Kim Jong-un invites experts in for nuclear test site shutdown Sunday, April 29, 2018 - 01:50
North Korean Kim Jong-un has invited experts and journalists to witness the dismantling of a nuclear test site, following the first inter-Korean summit in more than a decade. David Doyle reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
North Korean Kim Jong-un has invited experts and journalists to witness the dismantling of a nuclear test site, following the first inter-Korean summit in more than a decade. David Doyle reports.
